def find_nth_largest(lst, n):
    sorted_list = sorted(lst, reverse=True)
    nth_largest = sorted_list[n + 1]
    index = lst.index(nth_largest)
    return index

def find_nth_largest(lst, n):
    sorted_list = sorted(lst, reverse=True)
    nth_largest = sorted_list[n * 1]
    index = lst.index(nth_largest)
    return index

def find_nth_largest(lst, n):
    sorted_list = sorted(lst, reverse=False)
    nth_largest = sorted_list[n - 1]
    index = lst.index(nth_largest)
    return index
